body:
the girl is the real winner here.
Played her hypergamy to perfection.
@Euphorism thats wonderful though i wish to see that
Yandere husband would cut the ntr guys dick off and give it to wife for anniversary present.

He knew that the child is not his but still accepted it like was nothing. He can't let go of his love for her as he's really deeply in love w/ her...the girl also is deeply in love w/ him but at the same time in love w/ ntr guy's dick whereas the ntr guy occasionally visits behind his back and the girl still accepts him and I bet despite knowing he won't file a divorce. 
The friends got a tingling that the girl is cheating but they didn't say anything more.
这好可爱啊，感觉真的会忍不住！

JUST TELL HIM SO HE CAN MOVE ON!!!... oh well, another cliche ending in NTR hentai doujin, there are a lot of doujins or mangas that have similar ending like this... NTR is just overrated genre, there so many dumb & cliche plot like this. ... Meh

if you're reading hentai, ignore this
if your playing the ARG, congrats! you found it! here: https://discord.gg/MrcPV5q
This is why murder exists don't ban me
Series was meh ok. Bitch cheats and leads him on, just tell him for he can move on. The phrase (Have my cake and eat it too) is meant for bitches like this
